channel.title: List of questions (Please Help Me!)
channel.description:
1. How do I have the "System update in _:__" thing apear where split private chat does on my screen.
2. I'm using global objects correctly on my server, and when I try to hit the dummy I made in my cammy training room nothing happens.
3. How do I add a special bar?
I might add more...

item.title: List of questions (Please Help Me!)
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

[quote=“link1011, post:1, topic:99261”]1. How do I have the “System update in _:__” thing apear where split private chat does on my screen.

  1. I’m using global objects correctly on my server, and when I try to hit the dummy I made in my cammy training room nothing happens.

  2. How do I add a special bar?

I might add more…[/quote]
1.) there should be a command for it in most server…
2.)add this

if ((objectID == YOUROBJECTIDHERE) && (objectX == YOURXCOORDSHERE) && (objectY == YOURYCOORDSHERE)) { setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[3]), 3); actionTimer = 30; }
3.)there are tuts about it [font=bip]you can get it by klicking here[/font]

Read full topic
